Name: Chanelle Howell
Favorite Hobbies: Exploring new countries, trying new cuisines and blogging about them.
Pet Peeve: Slow walkers. It’s the New Yorker in me.
What is the accomplishment you are most: Utilizing my recruiting skills to create a mentorship program to help young women get into professional spaces.
What is something we would never know fr: I’m good at crunching numbers in my head!
Who is your hero and why: My parents! They’ve worked so hard to build a life for my siblings and I and set us up for success. I can never fully repay them, although I intend to try through winning the million!
Which past Survivor will you play the ga: Kim Spradlin played a perfect game, so just trying to keep that same energy.
Why do you believe you can be the Sole S: I’m truly a student of the game. I’ve watched all the seasons, I’ve studied the greats, and I’ve learned the nuances. I am a subject matter expert in SURVIVOR. Aside from having the “toolbelt” to win, my motivations will push me through the cold nights and hungry days. I want to show Black and brown girls that this game was made for us, too!
